com.adobe.aemds.guide.model

Class ValidationOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.aemds.guide.model.ValidationOptions

  • public class ValidationOptions
extends Object
    ValidationOptions describes the basic options required to validate an adaptive form on server side. Use ValidationOptions.ValidationOptionsBuilder , it's static helper class to define the validation options.
    Since:
    6.3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ValidationOptions.ValidationOptionsBuilder
      Static helper class to build validation options.
